refnamediv.refpurpose: Rewind array back to the start

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function rewinds the iterator to the beginning.

example.title: ArrayIterator::rewind example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$arrayobject = new ArrayObject();

$arrayobject[] = 'zero';
$arrayobject[] = 'one';
$arrayobject[] = 'two';

$iterator = $arrayobject->getIterator();

$iterator->next();
echo $iterator->key(); //1

$iterator->rewind(); //rewinding to the begining
echo $iterator->key(); //0
?>
